heading: Graphic Designing - Executive
job_description: As a Graphic Designing Executive, my purpose is to produce all the design-related work to promote events undeviatingly. I have composed posters, posts, banners and edited videos for several events under CodecChef Medicaps Chapter.

heading: User Interface Designer
job_description: During this job, I have designed user interfaces for applications and webpages. My role is to design an optimal user experience throughout the application. I have used various designing technologies like Adobe XD, InVision, Figma for Logo Designing etc.
